objects.text:
INSIGNIA HIGH-EFFICIENCY
DIGITAL FRONT LOAD WASHER

Advanced Digital Control Panel • Multiple Wash Programs • Large Capacity Drum
Energy-Efficient Design • Anti-Vibration System • Easy Access Features

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Digital Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Revolution
product_details.description:
• Advanced Digital Control Panel with LED Display for precise cycle monitoring
• Multiple Wash Programs including Express, Delicate, and Heavy Duty cycles
• Large Capacity Drum with spacious interior for family-sized loads
• Energy-Efficient Design - helps reduce utility bills while protecting the environment
• Sleek White Modern Design with premium black door accent
• User-Friendly Interface with intuitive dial selector and touch controls
• Variable Temperature Settings for optimal cleaning performance
• Adjustable Spin Speed Options to handle different fabric types
• Clear View Door Window to monitor wash progress
• Compact Yet Powerful - Perfect for apartments and small spaces
• Anti-Vibration System for quiet operation
• Digital Time Display showing remaining cycle time
• Multiple Water Level Options for efficient water usage
• Easy Access Detergent Dispenser

banner_details:
The banner showcases a sleek and modern promotional layout for a front-load washing machine. It features a soft gradient background with subtle abstract waves and geometric accents, creating a clean and contemporary aesthetic. The design places the product image centrally to draw immediate attention. The hierarchy of text elements is clear — a strong bold heading (`heading`) sits at the top, followed by a modern sans-serif tagline (`tagline`) in blue, emphasizing innovation. The supporting features text (`description`) is clean and informative. Pricing (`price`) is large and bold, followed by a vibrant call-to-action button (`cta`) effectively pulling the user to engage.

**Color Palette**:
- Navy Blue: `#2b5797`
- Sky Blue: `#0078d7`
- Soft Grey: `#f5f5f5`
- White: `#ffffff`
- Dark Grey: `#333333`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern front-load washing machine with a predominantly white body (#FFFFFF), which conveys cleanliness and minimalism. Accents of deep black (#1C1C1C) around the door frame create a bold contrast, drawing focus to the key functional area. The chrome-silver dial (#C0C0C0) adds a touch of sophistication, while the digital screen emits a striking electric blue glow (#00BFFF), highlighting key interface elements. Soft grays (#D3D3D3) subtly blend with the white, offering smooth transitions between functional components. A banner for this product could use a palette of White, Black, Silver, Electric Blue, and Gray to enhance product appeal.
